answers.answer: I had a dream last night that I was going into labor and my best friend said she had a dream that I was having the baby too,  I'm 39+2 so I hope it means labor is on its way!  But who knows could just be dreams!
Why are you having a c section?

@ftmbritts my mom had a dream I was giving birth at home. While I had a dream I was having a c section. lol@ericatoday I have preeclampsia so it will be safer having a c section than me actually pushing and my blood pressure will rise
Lol that's so funny I had a dream my water broke last night and when I woke up I was kinda bummed it was just a dream haha!
Haha @kendricksmommy thats funny. I just wish my baby was here already!

question: So the past 2 nights ive been having dreams that im giving birth. Im a FTM and Im 31 weeks today.  Ive already been told by my doctor that ima have her early and ima have a c section.  So my question is that does my dreams mean I might have my baby soon? Or is it just a dream?
title: Baby Dreams
